name: cr1ckt
description:
Cr1ck◼️t

There is more than 1 bug in this game and some of them are intentional.

Tap left and right to jump through the caves to the fruit ...as long as you are able to.

Comment how many jumps it takes you to finish the game! 😉  🦗

Controls

If you're playing the web version on desktop you have to click inside the window once after running the game to let the browser capture your input.

  • On desktop: A and D to jump left and right respectively
  • On mobile: tap the left or right half of your screen to jump that way
  • The longer you press, the further you jump
Source Code

NB: since the closing date for submissions we have pushed 1 change 4268907 to fix the sample rate for the music, this does not change the game but the fix was necessary because it caused so much slowdown that the game was unplayable on web.
